ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] BEGGARS (was-Something Awful.com pokes fun at EQ)
ygData.msgSnippet: give me three cheers for Druzzil Ro......   lol I will shout someday just to say Hi. Rob Fahzel 15 Druid Hallucian 16 Mage ...
ygData.messageBody:
give me three cheers for Druzzil Ro...... lol

I will shout someday just to say Hi.


Rob

Fahzel 15 Druid
Hallucian 16 Mage


--- Philip Harrelson <pharr@...> wrote:
> Oooooh! What a conversation starter!
>
> G'Fay is famous for the /ooc beggar. I, like you,
> usually end up "chiding"
> any beggar that pollutes the chat with a constant
> cry for platinum or even
> Power Leveling and gear. But, I have never been
> accused of being too harsh
> with someone. Most people start sending me tells
> agreeing with me about
> stupid beggars, and then they /ooc support to my
> discouragement of begging.
> And NOTHING pisses me off more than the ungrateful
> player. I have on
> occasion given some plat or newbie gear to people
> that wouldn't stop begging
> just to shut them up. And yes, I would say that most
> of the begging souls
> that I have donated anything to were just as
> ungrateful as the chap that you
> described. They can't even bother to type 2 letters
> -TY- or God forbid that
> they might actually /bow or /kneel or /thank...
> <:-P>
>
> I too often seek out young players above 3rd or 4th
> season that appear to be
> working hard to advance themselves the way that most
> of us did as
> NewB's....and while I expect nothing in return for
> the small gifts that I
> give. I find that more often than not these players
> are very thankful and
> benevolent. It just makes me feel all warm and
> fuzzy to make some new
> player's day.
> I have found that it "pays" to work hard for the
> things that you want--in RL
> and in EQ.
>
>
> I was going to say something about how all beggars
> should publicly die slow
> cruel deaths in explicit detail, but I'll leave it
> to your imagination----
>
> Redfists Bakdafugup - Cleric of His Holiness, Brell
> Serilis
>
> ( I can be found on the Druzzil Ro server at odd
> times of the day and night,
> feel free to say hello or even BEG from me, well
> that is to say that if you
> would like to make the list of people that will
> never ever ever get a free
> or cheap REZ from me you should definitely beg.)
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
